commit.message:
Auto merge of #25961 - sanxiyn:dead-variant-2, r=huonw

Rebase of #21468.

Fix #25960.

files.patch:

+
+#![deny(dead_code)]
+
+#[derive(Clone)]
+enum Enum {
+    Variant1, //~ ERROR: variant is never used
+    Variant2,
+}
+
+fn main() {
+    let e = Enum::Variant2;
+    e.clone();
+}

+// except according to those terms.
+
+#![deny(dead_code)]
+
+enum Foo {
+    A,
+    B,
+}
+
+pub fn main() {
+    match Foo::A {
+        Foo::A | Foo::B => Foo::B
+    };
+}
